scripts.lint: npm run clean && eslint --ignore-path .gitignore source/configuration.js source/task
scripts.buildBabel: npm run lint && babel --presets "@babel/env" source/babel.configuration.js --out-file distributable/babel.configuration.js --source-maps 1>/dev/null
scripts.buildConfiguration: npm run buildBabel && babel --config-file ./distributable/babel.configuration source/configuration.js --out-file distributable/configuration.js --source-maps 1>/dev/null
scripts.buildJake: npm run buildConfiguration && babel --config-file ./distributable/babel.configuration source/Jakefile.js --out-file Jakefile.js --source-maps && babel --config-file ./distributable/babel.configuration source/task --copy-files --out-dir distributable/task --source-maps 1>/dev/null
scripts.dump: dropdb --echo --if-exists azog-production && createdb --echo azog-production && pg_dump --host=RONAN.local --dbname=azog | psql --dbname=azog-production
